data.name: BAD_MAE_1
data.value: Your rank number is

data.name: BAD_MAE_2
data.value: . (The game displays invalid values as the max.) This may have been caused by a bad tool/script, such as the max stats script that used to be on the Modding Hub. Do you want to change it to 99, the maximum, to fix it? (You can change it to another value later.) If you select "No" here, the true value will not display in the AIO and you are at risk for a ban.

data.name: BAD_OKANE_1
data.value: Your coins are set to

data.name: BAD_OKANE_2
data.value: . (The game displays invalid values as the max.) This may have been caused by a bad tool/script, such as the max stats script that used to be on the Modding Hub. Do you want to change it to 9999999, the maximum, to fix it? (You can change it to another value later.) If you select "No" here, the true value will not display in the AIO and you are at risk for a ban.

data.name: CANNOT_REMOVE_JR_TEXT
data.value: You cannot remove the Splattershot Jr.

data.name: CONNECTION_FAILED_TEXT
data.value: Connection failed.\nMake sure that the provided IP address is correct and that TCPGecko is not being blocked by firewalls.

data.name: EQUIPPED
data.value: (EQUIPPED)

data.name: FILL_IN_ALL_FIELDS_TEXT
data.value: Please fill in all fields.

data.name: FIND_DIFF_FAILED_TEXT
data.value: Could not find the Splattershot Jr. in memory. Try using TCPGecko from loadiine.ovh. If that does not work, then the AIO may need to be updated for a new version of Splatoon.

data.name: INVALID
data.value: Invalid

data.name: INVALID_CLEAR_STATE
data.value: Invalid clear state.

data.name: INVALID_IP_TEXT
data.value: An invalid IP address was provided.

data.value: Invalid level number.

data.name: INVALID_TIME_ADDR
data.value: Cannot find timer address. Please go into one of the supported modes before proceeding.

data.name: LEVEL_ALREADY_ADDED_TEXT
data.value: This level has already been added. If you wish to edit it, please right click it in the list.

data.name: NO
data.value: No

data.name: SELECT_TIMER_TYPE_TEXT
data.value: Please select a timer type.

data.name: SINGLE_PLAYER_RESET_TEXT
data.value: Splat-AIO will reset all Octo Valley flags, removing all single player progress currently on your save file. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: SINGLE_PLAYER_RESET_TITLE
data.value: Alert

data.name: VERSION_CHECK_FAILED_TEXT
data.value: The AIO is incompatible with this version of Splatoon. If there is an update available, please download the new update to continue using the AIO.

data.name: WEAPON_EXISTS_TEXT
data.value: This weapon has already been added. If you wish to edit it, please right click it in the list.
